index=web | stats count by status

results.test_name: Challenge 3: Response time stats by status
results.query: index=web | stats avg(response_time) as avg_time, min(response_time) as min_time, max(response_time) as max_time by status | sort -avg_time
index=web status=200 [search index=web status=404 | fields src_ip | dedup src_ip | head 10]
index=web [search index=auth action=login status=success | fields user | dedup user | head 10 | return 1000 $user]

results.query: index=web status>=400 status<600 | stats count by status
index=web earliest=-24h | stats count
index=web | stats count by user | sort -count | head 10
index=auth action=login earliest=-1d NOT [search index=auth action=login earliest=-30d latest=-1d | fields user, src_ip] | stats count by user, src_ip | sort -count | head 10
index=web [search index=web earliest=-24h | stats count by user | sort -count | head 10 | fields user] | stats count as total by user | sort -total
index=web | stats count, avg(response_time) as avg_time, max(response_time) as max_time, min(response_time) as min_time by status
index=web | stats sum(bytes) as total_bytes by host | eval total_mb = round(total_bytes/1024/1024, 2)
index=web | stats dc(user) as unique_users, count as total_requests by host
index=web | stats values(status) as status_codes, count by host

results.test_name: Chart count over host by status
results.query: index=web | chart count over host by status
index=web | chart count over status by host limit=5
index=web | timechart span=1h avg(response_time) as avg_time
index=web | timechart span=1h count by status
index=web | timechart span=1h avg(response_time) as avg_time, max(response_time) as max_time, count
index=web | join type=inner user [search index=auth action=login | fields user, src_ip] | head 10

results.query: index=web earliest=-1h | append [search index=app earliest=-1h] | head 20
(index=web OR index=app) earliest=-1h | stats count by index
index=web earliest=-24h latest=-1h | stats count
index=web | timechart span=1h count by status
index=web | bucket _time span=15m | stats count by _time, host | head 20
index=web | timechart span=1d count as daily_count
index=web | timechart span=1h avg(response_time) as avg_response
index=web | stats count by status | sort -count
index=web | stats count by host
index=web | stats avg(response_time) as avg_response_time
index=web earliest=-1h sourcetype=* status>=500 | stats count by host
index=web | fields status, response_time, host | stats avg(response_time) by status
index=web | stats count, values(status) as statuses by src_ip | head 100
index=web | eval response_time_sec = response_time / 1000 | head 10

results.query: index=web | eval status_category = if(status < 400, "Success", "Error") | stats count by status_category

index=web | eval status_type = case(status >= 200 AND status < 300, "Success", status >= 300 AND status < 400, "Redirect", status >= 400 AND status < 500, "Client Error", status >= 500, "Server Error", 1=1, "Unknown") | stats count by status_type
index=web | eval user_field = coalesce(user, "anonymous") | stats count by user_field
index=web | eval url_length = len(url), url_upper = upper(url) | head 10

sample_results._raw: {"src_ip": "123.115.228.127", "user": "user0322", "method": "GET", "url": "/api/settings", "status": 302, "bytes": 32812, "referer": null, "user_agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 14_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15", "response_time": 102}

results.query: index=web | eval hour = strftime(_time, "%H"), day_of_week = strftime(_time, "%A") | stats count by hour
index=web | rex field=url "/(?<endpoint>[^/]+)$" | stats count by endpoint | head 10
index=app | rex "user=(?<username>\w+).*level=(?<log_level>\w+)" | stats count by log_level | head 10
index=web | rex field=_raw "(?<ip_addr>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | stats dc(ip_addr) as unique_ips
| inputlookup users.csv | head 10
index=web | lookup users.csv user_id OUTPUT email, department | head 10
index=web | lookup users.csv user_id OUTPUT department | stats count by department
index=web | timechart span=1h avg(response_time) as avg_time
index=web | stats avg(response_time) as avg_response, stdev(response_time) as stdev_response by host
index=sales | timechart span=1d sum(final_amount) as daily_revenue
index=sales | timechart span=1d sum(final_amount) as revenue | trendline sma3(revenue) as trend
index=_audit action=login | stats count by user | head 10
index=_audit action=search | stats count by user | head 10
index=* | stats count by index
index=* | stats count by sourcetype | sort -count
index=_internal source=*metrics.log | stats count by source
index=_internal source=*license_usage.log | stats sum(b) as bytes_indexed by idx
